meanings.definition: Relating to the sense of smell.
meanings.sent1: The olfactive sense helps us enjoy the aroma of fresh flowers.
meanings.sent2: The bakery was filled with olfactive delights of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent3: The olfactive detective solved the mystery using only his nose.
meanings.sent4: Her olfactive memory was so sharp, she could identify scents blindfolded.
meanings.sent5: The olfactive experience of the garden was like a symphony for the nose.

meanings.definition: Having a strong or pleasant smell.
meanings.sent1: The olfactive perfume filled the room with a sweet fragrance.
meanings.sent2: The olfactive candles created a cozy atmosphere in the house.
meanings.sent3: The olfactive cupcakes tempted everyone in the office to take a break.
meanings.sent4: The olfactive trail of the flowers led us to a hidden garden.
meanings.sent5: The olfactive presence of the ocean was calming and refreshing.
